snippet: Barney Hall, the voice of NASCAR as the lead announcer for Motor Racing Network, was scheduled to call his final event Sunday at Daytona International Speedway....

headline.print_headline: Barney Hall Stepping Down as Lead NASCAR Announcer
headline.main: Barney Hall Stepping Down as Lead NASCAR Announcer

lead_paragraph: Barney Hall, the voice of NASCAR as the lead announcer for Motor Racing Network, was scheduled to call his final event Sunday at Daytona International Speedway.
